Articles.Content:
I may have angered the kraken.

My Duna Explorer was outbound from Kerbin on a Trans-Duna Insertion trajectory, and everything seemed to be going well until the moment it transitioned SoIs.  instead of transiting to Kerbol's SoI, time stopped.  I still could move the camera and interact with the game, but the clock stopped ticking and the ship stopped moving.

Output log
